LanguageData.ROM_ApparelRaincoat.description: Water resistant coat often used by fishermen.
LanguageData.ROM_ApparelRaincoat.label: rain coat
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_ROM_SlickerHat.label: slicker hat
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_ROM_SlickerHat.description: A yellow hat designed to repel water, a favorite of anglers and retired accountants who enjoy fishing.
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_NF_FSOveralls.label: overalls
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_NF_FSOveralls.description: Who needs a belt when you can just wear pants so tall they go up to your shoulders? Not you! You've got overalls!
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_ROM_StrawHat.label: straw hat
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_ROM_StrawHat.description: A hat fashioned from straw to shield the user from the sun.
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_CallOfCthulhuTopHat.label: top hat
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_CallOfCthulhuTopHat.descript: An elegant hat which gives the wearer a sophisticated look of importance. Improves social impact.
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_CallOfCthulhuNewsboyCap.desc: A plain cap which gives off an urban look. Improves social impact.
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_CallOfCthulhuFedora.label: fedora
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_CallOfCthulhuBowler.label: bowler hat
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_CallOfCthulhuBowler.descript: A stylish hat which gives off a slightly formal, business style. Improves social impact.
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_NurseCap.label: nurse cap
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_NurseCap.description: An ancient nurse cap from the first Great War. While typically worn by female nurses historically, residents of the rim both male and female have found it most fashionable.
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_WW1NurseUniform.description: An ancient nurse uniform from the first Great War. While typically worn by female nurses historically, residents of the rim both male and female have found it most fashionable.
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_WW1NurseUniform.label: nurse uniform
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_DetectiveSlacks.label: slacks
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel1920sPoliceHat.label: police hat
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel1920sPoliceHat.description: Designates someone as an authority figure. The accuracy of this designation is left to the eye of the beholder.
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel1920sPoliceOutfit.description: Early 20th century attire suited for local enforcers to use when keeping the peace.
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel1920sPoliceOutfit.label: police uniform
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_CallOfCthulhuShirtTie.descri: During the 20th century, this piece of apparel became highly fashionable for conducting business.
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_CallOfCthulhuShirtTie.label: shirt and tie
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_CallOfCthulhuPlaidShirt.desc: During the 20th century, this piece of apparel became popular attire for laborers.
LanguageData.ROM_ApparelWWIHelmet.label: infantry helmet (World War I)
LanguageData.ROM_ApparelWWIHelmet.description: To avoid coming home from the front lines in seperate bags, be sure to wear this simplistic protective headwear.
LanguageData.ROM_ApparelWWIUniform.description: This apparel made it easier to distinguish friendlies on the battlefield. However, it provided little in the way of actual body armor.
LanguageData.ROM_ApparelWWIUniform.label: infantry uniform (World War I)
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_MERF_LightHelmet.description: A lightweight combat helmet designed for the M.E.R.F. special forces branch of The Agency. MERF stands for Mobile Eldritch Response Force.
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_MERF_LightHelmet.label: MERF Light Helmet
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_MERF_HeavyHelmet.description: A heavy combat helmet designed for the M.E.R.F. special forces branch of The Agency. M.E.R.F. stands for Mobile Eldritch Response Force.
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_MERF_HeavyHelmet.label: MERF heavy helmet
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_MERF_Armor.description: Specialized body armor to protect members of the M.E.R.F. branch of The Agency. M.E.R.F. stands for Mobile Eldritch Response Force.
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_MERF_Armor.label: MERF body armor
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_MERF_Coat.description: Extra padding for supporting M.E.R.F. members during their service.
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_MERF_Coat.label: MERF coat
LanguageData.ROM_TemporaryRegionBarrier.label: temporary region barrier
LanguageData.ROM_TemporaryDoorMarker.label: temporary region barrier
LanguageData.ROM_AgencySymbolFloorPainting.label: agency emblem floor painting
LanguageData.ROM_AgencySymbolFloorPainting.descriptio: Shining symbol of the agency that stands to investigate and contain the threat of extra-dimensional entities.
LanguageData.ROM_AgencyReceptionistTable.label: table (reception)
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_Revolver.label: webley revolver
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_Revolver.description: Military and police model revolving gun with six .38 caliber bullet chambers. Fires six shots before reloading.
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_Revolver.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_Revolver.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.ROM_Bullet_Harpoon.label: harpoon bolt
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_Harpoon.label: hand-held harpoon gun
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_Harpoon.description: A special weapon devised by coastal fishing villages at the turn of the 20th century. Packs a punch and is rather lethal.
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_Harpoon.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_Harpoon.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_Harpoon.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.ROM_Bullet_Flare.label: flare
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_Flaregun.label: coastal flare gun
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_Flaregun.description: A flaregun is typically used as a distress signal for sailors at sea. In a life or death situation, a flaregun can be used as a deadly combat weapon.
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_Flaregun.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_Flaregun.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.ROM_Bullet_TommyGun.label: tommy gun bullet
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_TommyGun.label: tommy gun
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_TommyGun.description: A classic submachine gun also known as the Chicago Typewriter. Medium range, decent power, high rate of fire. Very quick to aim and fire.
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_TommyGun.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_TommyGun.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_PumpShotgun_COC.label: farmer's shotgun
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_PumpShotgun_COC.description: Ancient design. Deadly, but short range.
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_PumpShotgun_COC.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_PumpShotgun_COC.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_SurvivalRifle_COC.label: hunting rifle
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_SurvivalRifle_COC.description: Ancient pattern bolt-action rifle. Good range, good power, low rate of fire.
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_SurvivalRifle_COC.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_SurvivalRifle_COC.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_LPRifle_COC.label: old-fashioned rifle
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_LPRifle_COC.description: Ancient pattern bolt-action rifle. Good range, good power, low rate of fire.
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_LPRifle_COC.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.ROM_Gun_LPRifle_COC.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.ROM_PoleHook.label: polehook
LanguageData.ROM_PoleHook.description: A meat hook fixed to the end of a pole. A terrifying weapon to behold.
LanguageData.ROM_PoleHook.tools.0.label: shaft
LanguageData.ROM_PoleHook.tools.1.label: hook
LanguageData.ROM_WoodAxe.label: wood axe
LanguageData.ROM_WoodAxe.description: An axe used by lumberjacks to quickly turn trees into valuable resources.
LanguageData.ROM_WoodAxe.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.ROM_WoodAxe.tools.1.label: axe head
LanguageData.ROM_Pitchfork.label: pitchfork
LanguageData.ROM_Pitchfork.description: Used by farmers to help manage hay.
LanguageData.ROM_Pitchfork.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.ROM_Pitchfork.tools.1.label: teeth
LanguageData.ROM_BrandingIron.label: hot branding iron
LanguageData.ROM_BrandingIron.description: A burning hot tool commonly used to brand livestock with prescribed insignias.
LanguageData.ROM_BrandingIron.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.ROM_BrandingIron.tools.1.label: tip
